landing.introText: allows you to report possible deviations from the Group's Code of Ethics and/or policies. It allows reporting conduct that may be illegal, unethical, or that violates professional standards; that is, that are inconsistent with the Group's Code of Ethics. You can register irregularities using the service channels indicated in the following section.
landing.registerNewIrregularity: To register a new irregularity, you can go to the following link:
landing.emailInstructions: You can send an email to the following address:
landing.voicemailInstructions: You can report an irregularity through a voice message 24 hours a day, 365 days a year, by dialing option 2 at the following number:
landing.phoneLineInstructions: You can contact a professional directly from Monday to Friday from 8:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m. at the following number:
landing.inPersonInstructions: If you wish to be attended in person, go to:
landing.appointmentRequired: In-person interviews are available by appointment.
landing.mailInstructions: If you want to provide physical information, send it to the following address at any time:

additionalQuestions.howDidYouKnow: How did you become aware of these facts?
additionalQuestions.coworkerToldMe: A coworker told me about the situation
additionalQuestions.involvesExternalPeople: Does this incident involve people outside the group?
additionalQuestions.beingHidden: Do you believe these facts are being hidden in any way?
additionalQuestions.managementKnows: Does any director, manager, assistant manager, or supervisor know about these facts?
additionalQuestions.managementInfo: Indicate if someone in a position of responsibility has prior knowledge of this irregularity.
additionalQuestions.relationshipType: What type of relationship exists between the people involved?
additionalQuestions.benefits: What types of benefits do the people involved in the irregularity receive?
additionalQuestions.witnesses: What witnesses do you think could contribute more evidence of this irregularity?

question1.label: Select the type of irregularity you want to report

question4.label: Indicate the date or period when the incident occurred

question5.label: Describe all the details that help analyze and evaluate your irregularity
question5.placeholder: Include relevant information such as dates, places, people involved, and a detailed description of the facts.

question6.label: Do you have physical or digital evidence that could help in the investigation?

options.notPossible: It is not possible for me to provide any evidence
options.notHave: I don't have evidence, but I could obtain it
options.bothTypes: I have physical and digital evidence that I would like to provide
options.physical: I have physical evidence that I want to provide
options.digital: I have digital evidence that I want to provide

fields.physicalDelivery: Indicate how you will deliver the physical information
fields.whereToObtain: Where could the Group obtain evidence?
fields.whereElse: Where else could evidence be obtained?

question6.fileAttach: Files will be attached when submitting the form.

question17.label: Which of the following options best describes your relationship with the Group?

question18.label: Do you want to keep your identity anonymous?
question18.emailContact: Provide an email address to maintain contact
question18.emailNote: This email will be used only for communications related to your report.

personalInfo.title: Optional Contact Information
personalInfo.subtitle: If you have no objection to sharing your identity  "Optional Contact Information
If you have no objection to sharing your identity, please provide the following optional information
personalInfo.anonymous: You have chosen to keep your identity anonymous. You can continue to the next step.

fields.otherContact: Indicate any other form of contact
fields.position: Indicate your position in the Group
fields.area: Indicate the area to which you belong

summary.title: Report Summary
summary.reviewNote: Please review the information before submitting your report. Once submitted, you will receive a tracking code.

terms.authorize: I authorize Grupo Silvestre to process my personal data
terms.agreement: By submitting this form, I agree that I have read the personal data processing clause.

summary.submitNote: Click the "Submit report" button to register your irregularity. You will receive a tracking code for future inquiries.

success.title: Report successfully submitted
success.message: You will be redirected to the home page in a few seconds...
success.code: Your report has been registered with the code: GS-

errors.incompleteFields: Please complete all required fields before continuing.
errors.termsRequired: You must accept the terms and conditions to submit the report.
errors.selectAtLeastOne: You must select at least one option
errors.relationRequired: You must indicate your relationship with the Group
errors.anonymityRequired: You must indicate if you want to keep your identity anonymous
errors.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
